The color is nice, not see through, the fabric is super soft and has kept up through washes. The cut and neck is nice, I love ruffles and puffs  so the sleeves are super fun. Nothing rides up. The shirt is super soft so it doesn't wrinkle or crease as far as I can tell.

评论概述: Just like photos - good quality, super cute top (size Medium - white with blue stripes)
评论详情: This trendy striped top is exactly as shown in the photos.  The material is good quality and machine washable.  I washed the top using warm water, delicate cycle and laid flat to dry.  The sleeves are puffed but not too puffy and stood up as shown in photos.  I am 5'7", 135lbs and I bought a size Medium which was a perfect fit. The cut is flattering.  It was not tight or close fitting through the mid-section or across the chest. The fabric is fairly lightweight, similar to a light sweater material and would be comfortable in warm weather.  The blue stripes are more of a royal blue, leaning towards purple.
The material of this sweater is great. It’s soft and thick and warm. It’s fit and color are exactly as pictured. Highly recommend.
